[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: GetAllowance() and GetAllowanceByTokenHash()] [Consistency] Can these functions return inconsistent allowances due to hash collision or state race conditions? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: GetNFTInfo()] [Integration Risk] Can downstream contracts misinterpret empty NFTInfo as valid but uninitialized NFTs? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: GetBalance()] [Integration Risk] Can DeFi protocols relying on GetBalance be exploited if balance queries return stale data during active transfers? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: GetOperatorList()] [Integration Risk] Can operator permissions be bypassed if operator list queries return incomplete data? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: GetNFTTypes()] [Edge Case] If NFT type mappings are extended post-deployment, can GetNFTTypes return incomplete type lists? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.NFT/NFTContract_View.cs] [Function: CalculateTokenHash()] [Hash Predictability] Can attackers predict future token hashes to front-run NFT purchases or mintings? (Medium)
